definition.text: This is a minimalist workspace you may use to start from a clean slate.

paragraphs.text: The basic system components including the Masters Trading Mine and the Candles Data Mine.
The BTC-USDT Market installed on the Binance exchange.
The collection of tested exchanges in case you need to obtain the configuration from an exchange different than Binance.

You may switch to a different market by changing the configuration of the assets under the Exchange Assets node, and you may switch to a different exchange by changing the configuration of the Crypto Exchange node.
